sentences.en: I want to restore China's psychometric up.
sentences.cn: 我要把中国的心理测量恢复起来。

sentences.en: We ask candidates to complete a psychometric questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 我们让候选人填写一份心理测试问卷。

sentences.en: Getting back to the Internet Addiction test, there's surprisingly few psychometric validity studies conducted on this test.
sentences.cn: 再回到网络成瘾测验，奇怪的是很少的有效的心理测量被用到这个测试中来。
